title: it all starts with you
subtitle:
help meet immediate needs and
be part of life-changing outcomes
in your community

section_1.title: reach people in need
section_1.description: When a person becomes a Samaritan Member, they set top-level goals with a care provider, as well as related action steps and needs for those goals. From here, Members can access funds from a team of samaritans (folks like you!) looking to support their journey.

section_2.title: enable steps foreward
section_2.description: Members also earn $10-$20 bonuses as they take action steps towards goals, such as meeting with a housing specialist, getting a COVID-19 shot, or building a resume. Money for this comes from our Action Fund.me

section_3.title: meet immediate needs
section_3.description: Funds are redeemed alongside the care provider to address critical needs, such as food, bills, prescriptions, move-in fees, transportation, and more.

section_4.title: everyone needs a teamâ€¦
section_4.description: Each individual is backed by a team of volunteer and professional samaritans. Each team commits monthly acts of kindness around the person directly, raising hope & capacity to find housing, employment, recovery, and more.

section_5.title:
so they can
move forward
section_5.description: Strengthened relationships with care providers, coupled with social and financial support from the community, have helped members reach life-changing outcomes like a stable home.
